content: GF#13060 - Fix summary and modifier flags for Knowledge Resources

RequestGroup

  • description should be summary
  • textEquivalent should be summary
  • relatedAction should be modifier
  • type should be modifier
  • behavior elements should be modifiers
  • resource should be modifier
  • condition should be modifier

- I don't think that relatedAction should be a modifier: It doesn't modiy the meaning of the element, only modulate it's use.
- I don't think that type should be modifier - it's an *action* - the kind of action to take doesn't modify that it's an action
- I don't think that the behavior elements should be a modifier - It doesn't modiy the meaning of the element, only modulate it's use.
- I don't see how resource can be a modifier at all.Can the focus alter the nature of the action? An action to not to do an action?
- same for condition.
Approved by motion on FMG call, with caveat that we're only approving the summary changes, not the modifier changes.
